diff_hunk:
@@ -501,14 +501,21 @@ fi
 
 chmod +x ${TMP_SCRIPT}
 
+# Map TF_BUILD container types to containers we actually have.
+if [[ "${CTYPE}" == "android_nightly" ]]; then
body: My nit point is the word "nightly" doesn't really tell us what the more extensive build does. It is also less flexible semantically in case we decide to run the build in some cadence other than nightly (e.g., hourly or postsubmit).
body_html: My nit point is the word "nightly" doesn't really tell us what the more extensive build does. It is also less flexible semantically in case we decide to run the build in some cadence other than nightly (e.g., hourly or postsubmit).
body_text: My nit point is the word "nightly" doesn't really tell us what the more extensive build does. It is also less flexible semantically in case we decide to run the build in some cadence other than nightly (e.g., hourly or postsubmit).
